Movie Theater: 2D points, rectangles sizes & ray-casting 10
Factory: Minimal solutions to sets of linear equations 11
Reactor: Graph paths + caching 12
Christmas Tree Farm: Shape fitting in 2D grids %% Version 2025-12-17a
